EmailTemplate.description: Notifications that goes to customers & 3rd party partners to let them know that inspections have been scheduled.
EmailTemplate.name: Inspection Scheduled Checkbox = True
EmailTemplate.subject: Update From Palmetto On Your Solar System - Building Inspections Scheduled - {!Opportunity.Contact__c} - {!Account.BillingAddress}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
Your local building permit office of inspections has scheduled their time to inspect your solar system {!Opportunity.Inspection_Completed_Date__c}.
After the building permit office approves of the installation, you have one final inspection from your electric utility company before we can energize your system!
Best Regards,
Palmetto Customer Care Department customer.care@palmetto.com Main: (843) 720-1844 Toll: (855) 339-1831
